annotations:
FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 26-08-2024 08:00:29   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17740473
ATTN CHARTERING DESK
GOOD DAY
DIRECT CHARTERERS ORDER
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE VESSEL FOR FOLLOWING FIRM ORDER
ACCT DIRECT CHRTS
LAYCAN :  25-29 AUG 2024
QTY: 45,000 +/-10% MOLOO
CARGO : CLINKER IN BULK
LOADPORT : 1 SB 1 SP BUKPYUNG, S.KOREA
DISCH PORT : (INCHOPT)
1-2 SA, 1 SP CHITTAGONG OR
1-2 SA +1 SB, 1 SP CHITTAGONG, OR
1-2 SA 1 SP CHITTAGONG +1 SA 1 SP MONGLA
LOAD RATE: 10,000 MT PWWD SHINC EXCEPT SUPER HOLIDAYS
DISRATE : (INCHOPT)
AT CTG/MONGLA : 5,000 /6,000 MT PWWD FHINC
NIL ADCOM PUS
REMARKS:
- LOADING PORT RESTRICTION : LOA MAX. 195M / BEAM MAX. 32.25M / DRAFT MAX. 11.80M / AIR DRAFT MAX. 13.5M
- VESSEL : SDSTBC, FOLDING TYPE HATCH COVER OPENING FORE/AFT, GEARED, MAX 25 (TWENTY FIVE) YRS
IF LIGHTERAGE IS REQUIRED AT KUTUBDIA TO REACH ALPHA ANCHORAGE THEN OWNER TO PAY EXTRA LIGHTER FREIGHT USD 1.5 PER MT TO CARGO RECEIVER EITHER VIA CHARTERER OR VIA SHIPPING AGENT BEFORE SAILING OF THE VSL.
OWRS GUARANTEE THAT ALL SHIP CRANES AND SHIP GRABS ARE IN GOOD WORKING CONDITIONS AND ALL SHIP CRANES AND SHIP GRABS ARE CAPABLE TO DISCHARGE 5,000 / 6,000 MT PWWD AND NEED TO CAPABLE TO LOAD AT A TIME 2 LIGHTERS CAPACITY EACH LIGHTERS 3500 MT , IF VESSEL IS UNABLE TO LOAD/DISCHARGE OR NO USE OF SHIP GRABS THEN FIXED DISCHARGE RATE TO BE PRORATED.
PLSD TO HEAR.
BEST REGARDS,
Siddharth Arya | Voyage Desk
Direct: +91 22 4044 9001
Mobile: +91 9821230311
SKYPE ID: asbpl.siddharth@outlook.com
AS BROKERS ONLY
As Agents for Core Shipping Ltd.
Email: fix@aryacorp.com (Chartering) |  ops@aryacorp.com (Post Fixture)
Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/arya-corp-private-limited
Website: www.aryacorp.com
SHIPBROKING | BUNKERING | AGENCY & REPRESENTATION
